casebody.data:
In the Matter of E.F.S., Jr. No. 285P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 26, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of May 2006."
